summary: A cosy small to medium house that replaces "Crabber's Shanty" as a player home. All with no load doors so you can hear all the outside world from inside the house. (EXTERIOR HOUSE)
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DESCRIPTION-

A cosy small to medium house that replaces "Crabber's Shanty" as a player home. It feature's a kitchen, dining, bathroom and 1 bedroom in the interior and on the exterior there is a small jetty with a fishing spot. I always wanted a nice beautiful cosy place to call home, I've tryed alot of other peoples mods but they just didn't satisfy me after a while so I have attempted to create my own home all with no load doors so you can hear all the outside world from inside the house, bit more immersive I think, there is a map marker south of solitude where "Crabber's Shanty" use to be you cant miss it.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-VIDEOS-

Home In The Valley - Version 1.0

[youtube]JBOhlkm0ROM[/youtube]

Home In The Valley - Version 2.0

[youtube]C0h2cjewUag[/youtube]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-UPDATE VERSION 2.0 FEATURES-

-Rain Block (Doesnt rain inside the house).
-Door Lock (So you can lock the front door).
-Added second story to the house and the bedroom is now upstairs.
-Added fireplace with cooking pot.
-Adjusted and changed a few things inside and outside the house.
-Added a bathroom with a bath and toilet.
-Navmeshed outside so enemies wont try walk through walls and attack you.
-Added little details here and there.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-COMING SOON VERSION 3.0-

-Full navmesh so the house will be follower friendly inside and out.
-Fixes to the lighting inside the house (Some lights are currently flickering in certain rooms).
-Little tweaks here and there to make the house just that bit better.
-Adding small objects and furniture to fill the house up more (Feeling a little empty in my opinion).
-Adding garden shed outside with tools and bits and pieces for hunting, fishing and storage.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-COMMUNITY-

"Superb choice of location! Morning sun shooting over the mountain at 7.45am, the peaceful chatter of the little brook... This home is perfect for anyone who wants a little solitude away from Solitude." - AlvaGry.

"I think this is my favorite home mod for Skyrim, it's absolutely perfect to me. Thanks a lot for your great work!" - billandthediamonds.

"Such a peaceful and lovely small house." - julia20002.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-INSTALLATION-

Install manually into your Skyrim Data folder and make sure you have activated the file in "DATA FILES" of your Skyrim launcher.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-UNINSTALLATION-

Simply delete "Home In The Valley.esp".

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Rhys Ian Harris

files.name: Home In The Valley
